string-array.item: Each time he loses a life point, he immediately draws a card from the deck.
She can use BANG! cards as Missed! cards and vice versa. If she plays a Missed! card as a BANG!, she cannot play another BANG! card that turn (unless she has a Volcanic in play).
Each time he loses a life point due to a card played by another player, he draws a random card from the hands of that player (one card for each life point).
